activities:
Indeed is the #1 job site worldwide, with over 50 million unique visitors and 1 billion job searches per month. Indeed is available in more than 50 countries and 26 languages, covering 94% of global GDP. Indeed uses personal data to help the job seeker find a job, get in touch with the right employer, improve the job application process and give feedback regarding previous employers. This data includes: name, address, email address, phone number

Indeed has established a subsidiary company in Ireland which shall receive resumes. Every person posting a resume/CV has consented to that resume being shown to persons in the US company.  Indeed will share Irish subsidiary employee information with the home office in the US.  For the purposes of Human Resources administration, we collect: name, address, email address, birth date, Tax ID, phone number and other information as required by local laws.
address: 7501 N. Capital of Texas Hwy, Building B
personaldata: customer, client, and organization. Persons that want Indeed to facilitate their job search give Indeed: telephone, physical and email addresses.
